tasks.task_description: Add Swagger/OpenAPI documentation to the service
Set up Cloud Logging and Monitoring dashboards
Create alert policies for critical metrics

description: Phase 7 Documentation & Handoff - Complete documentation and monitoring setup
context: Completed Milestone 7.1 Documentation: Updated README with comprehensive documentation, added Swagger/OpenAPI documentation to the service with detailed API specs, created architecture diagram in HTML format showing monolithic architecture, data flow, and deployment. Swagger UI now available at /api-docs endpoint.

Completed Phase 7 Milestone 7.1 Documentation & Handoff. Created comprehensive runbook with troubleshooting procedures, monitoring guidelines, deployment procedures, and emergency response plans. All documentation committed and deployed. Swagger UI will be available at /api-docs endpoint once deployment completes. Milestone 7.2 (monitoring setup) remains for Cloud Logging/Monitoring dashboards.
